title: Imbalance of mitochondrial fusion in peripheral blood mononuclear cells is associated with liver fibrosis in patients with metabolic dysfunction-associated steatohepatitis
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Thanaput Kunlayawutipong, Nattayaporn Apaijai, Kanokkan Tepmalai, Sarawut Kongkarnka, Apinya Leerapun, Kanokporn Pinyopornpanish, Atiwat Soontornpun, Siriporn C. Chattipakorn, Nipon Chattipakorn, Kanokwan Pinyopornpanish
